title: Multilayered Frequency-Selective and High-Performance Electromagnetic Interference Shielding Materials Derived from Waste Polyurethane Foam

The development of electromagnetic interference (EMI) shielding composites with tunable frequency-selective shielding attributes is critically important for their applications in military and signal detection fields. This study introduces a multilayered...
